TopicTitle: [0.23.5] Green Skull Inc. Custom Design Spacesuits - v0.38 - 14th April 14

Articles.Content:
Might want to check out the Copyright and other legal 'stuff' on those little yellow dudes... Those movie companies and types can get 'perturbed' by the simplest of things. I was trying to find a pattern for my wife to make a gift and we got 'slapped' for even asking for such... Unless went through proper 'paid' for means....

your stuff is awesome. dont want to see anything bad happen...

cheers.

All ready thought of that. Expect a yellow head, some similar goggles and a blue spacesuit all by me.
let er rip..... waiting already for it.....
Jebediah leads a team to inspect the docking of Kavant 1 to the Mir space station.

Introducing the KSO Pack featuring Phase 1 and 2 Suits and helmets. Includes the Kerbalgeddon suits for the upcoming asteroid re-divert missions. Mega Pack Updated to include them - version stays the same. KSO-Pack-v0.37
Am busy working on some new suit textures ready for release next week! More missions, KSO Station crew suit and more coloured suits!
Am hoping to release updated packs on Wednesday with new suit colours - Keep a look out for it!
Grats on the Daily! This will get a lot more attention I hope.
The joker face gets me.
Congratulations on getting featured in the Daily. Well deserved.
but where are the missions?

[h=1]Error (509)[/h]This account's public links are generating too much traffic and have been temporarily disabled!

ARE YOU MÃ‚Â§%f/$=*' SERIOUS?

but where are the missions?

The mission suits are located in the alternate textures folder in the appropriate pack. American missions are in the FASA and Kerbal States pack. Soviet are in the Koviet Union pack. Mega pack has them all. Instructions on how to change textures are included in the README file. If you get confused post back here.

Did everyone break Dropbox? I will try to reload on Spaceport starting now. If not I will post alternate links. Sorry but it was working up until today...

does this work with the ARM update?
It should work.
Agreed it should work and if not I will fix it but from what I read the ARM is an extension not new version of 0.23.
Can confirm compatibility with ARM patch. Please report any issues you may find.
Making final colour balances to new coloured suits. Looking to release Friday along with a probable TextureReplacer version update in v0.38.
